Bash(git commit --no-verify -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: port ReportingController with ~97 endpoints and Angular report launcher

Server-side Crystal Reports proxy, SP-based Excel exports \(EPPlus\), iCal schedule
export, and export history tracking — all following clean architecture with JWT-derived
context. Single Angular route \(reporting/:action\) handles all report menu items with
wildcard prefix matching to remove Coming Soon badges.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit --no-verify -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement LADT editor with signal-driven tree expansion and hierarchy badges

Backend: LadtController, LadtService, League/Division repositories,
LADT admin methods on AgeGroup/Team repositories. Frontend: full LADT
hierarchy editor with league/agegroup/division/team detail panels,
signal-based expand/collapse \(bypasses broken CDK FlatTreeControl\),
blue team + green player badges at all levels, and add-child stubs.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit --no-verify -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add club name display, row numbers, and sortable columns to LADT editor

Surface club name \(via ClubRepRegistrationId → Registration.ClubName\) in
tree view and sibling grid so admins can distinguish identically-named
teams across clubs. Tree shows club name as primary label with team name
secondary; grid adds frozen Club column alongside row numbers. All grid
columns are now sortable by header click with ascending/descending toggle.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
